cab.content: n n 9w cj eJMilitary Secret. 1393Fro?n Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,1th June 1920.7182. No. 196. Part I. Of Mahsud families migrating to Khost 30 have arrived Matun another 20 have returned home. Some of recalcitrant sections now-reported to be collecting rifles to hand in.Part II. Nil. Above communicated to Press.
